reviewText: I'm sad to say that i only found out about this show due to the fact that lifetime is now playing reruns of it. I loved what shows i saw so i decided to buy the seasons on dvd. The new adventures of old Christine is hilarious. I really wish the network that ran the show would have advertised a lot more and then maybe it wouldn't have been canceled. I would recommend this comedy to anyone who loves to laugh. I'm anxiously waiting for seasons 4 and 5 to come out on dvd!

Love watching this, excellent humour and life observations.

Sadly only 10 episodes in series due to scriptwriters strike so perhaps not best value for money at full price.

I am totally bummed this ends with season 5....this is my new favorite show, its so funny.  I am on amazon trying to grab a deal to get all that is available so far.  Hope they release 4 and 5 soon....LOVE IT!

This is a fun show that I only discovered on DVD.  We had purchased season one and two at a retail outlet and were very dissapointed to learn that later seasons would not be available for sale, except on line.  Amazon was the only place I could get this in Canada and I am very grateful....here's looking forward to season four and five.

Best season ever.
But only 10 episodes?
You must be kidding.

I loved this show but again full price for a partial season (My Boys final season only has 9 eps)?  I will be searching for better prices (pssst...the WBstore has it for $10 less).  Why not bundle seasons 3 & 4 and leave the final season of Christine to stand alone (it wasn't as good anyway)  Still I wish the show hadn't been canceled, because Eric McCormack was awesome.
The show is doing pretty well, now in its 5th season. I just don't understand why the studio refuses to release seasons 3 and 4 on DVD or iTunes!
LOVE IT
So sad I didn't know about this show while in production . Julia and Wanda are my heroes in this show!
Wonderful!
I like it.
FUNNY! After a hard day at work, "The New Adventures" are a great way to wind down.
Very funny
Best comedy show EVER!  Julia Louis-Dreyfus and the rest of the cast are absolutely hilarious!  This is a show that you will watch again and again and again. I bought all 5 seasons.
All I can say is oh my gosh.!!!!
Yes, now I can watch it when I want to, instead of waiting until 1 or 2 a.m.
This show is hilarious!  I wish that it would have continued.  Julia Louis Dryfuss, the actor that played her husband, and Wanda Sykes had great chemistry.
Great show
Love this show.
This show is hysterical, I love all Seasons!  I watch it on our Smart TV through Amazon.
Excellent!! thanks
I was so sad when this show was cancelled.  Julia Louis-Dreyfus is the BEST!!!  I love that I can cow watch this show whenever I wish.
EXTREMELY FUNNY
Loved this show.
This is the best show ever!!
This show is so incredibly funny. Our DVD order came in a flash and in perfect condition. We are super happy!
This show makes me feel less crazy!
Very funny!! Wish it was still on

I continue to love this series. I love laughing my head off at the over the top (somewhat) realistic divorced woman antics. She helps you laugh at yourself as you're laughing at her and her predicaments.
Good Service and Price.
Hilarious
Delivery was fast....CD was great!!!
Excellent service! Loved the item; will buy from again; many thanks!
Great Item. Great price.

Hilarious.  However, only had like 8 episodes due to writer's strike.  I purchased it as an Amazon creation.  No extras.  The cover and DVDs are not exactly like from the manufacturer, but the picture and quality is identical and great.
Great ahow
Love this show!
ONE OF MY ALL TIME FAVORITE TV SERIES. LOVE LOVE IT!!!!!
Love this show!
Love this show. Very funny!
she's a real "natural" in this show.
Great
My husband and I love this show. It is a shame that they stopped it at season 5. SEasons 3 to 5 are so expensive but I looked EVERYWHERE for weeks and amazon was the best price.
Love all the episodes of New Christine!
good price and speedy delivery
WOW!
by far one of the funniest shows on tv and now dvd. i have these one when i need a break from the hectic pace of life and get a good laugh to make the day better.
Gift for my mom. She is more than pleased with these DVD's. All she wants now is seasons 4 and 5!
Incredibly hilarious!
Happy with it
I love Julia in anything.  She's incredible comedic actress.  The supporting cast is great too.  Even at my lowest, this show can make me laugh.
Very funny season, the only negative aspect of this is that the season is only 10 episodes the season before was double that so was a bit disappointed in it didn't last that long to watch
I love this series. So funny. It makes me laugh and cry all at the same time. Once, I even had an allergic reaction to how funny it was.
now that I figured out how to download videos works perfect..the show is genious and so is  the miss JLD
i loved her on Seinfeld and i absolutely love her on her own show.....the woman is amazingly funny and entertaining
One of my favorite all time series, and glad to finally see every single episode that I might have missed when it aired
wife loves this show and it makes a great gift as a collectible for her library of videos. Great deal
I absolutely loved this show, and I am so glad I can watch dvd's since the show was cancelled.  I have the first 3 seasons, and love all of them!!

I live this sense of humor , good! Good actress!
I would like to have a season 7 too! But I think it doesn't exist
This dvd was suppose to be NEW. I can tell it was repackaged. the first disc was dirty and scratched, The only reason I might keep it is because both disc does play.
This is the shortest season of the series, but I loved it anyway, the DVD has no captions or features, but it woth it!
This was the funniest show ever!  "One and a half men" is my favorite episode!  I highly recommend buying any of these seasons or episodes!

I love Old Christine, and I bought the last 3 seasons on DVD (I already had the other 2) I already knew they were just DVD-R
But they don't have subtitles, or closed captioned.
And the presentation is pretty cheap (I don't care about this that much)
But reality is I want to watch this show with non english speakers or hearing impaired, and now I own it on DVD but I HAVE to watch it by myself, and if I want to share it I have to watch it on TV with subtitles, that's just stupid.
If you are going to sell me DVDs like this, (with nothing) make them cheaper paying 90+ bucks for the last 3 seasons is just way to expensive, the first two seasons are cheaper, presentation is better and have everything a DVD needs.
Great show, cheap treatment to it.
I love this show! Never get sick of watching it, Julia Louis Dreyfus is a great actress, the whole cast is fantastic. Parts are laugh-out-loud funny.
This show is very funny with new christine in hilarious situations. Characters are really funny and it makes for a good show. It is a show you watch no matter which episode is on.

I wish this series was still on the air. But I can watch it
now anytime I want now and love it
This series went off the air too soon!  So creative and funny.  Great characters.  I like her better as Christine than Eileen, and I loved the Eileen character!

I started watching this show after it was over on tv, and found it to be hilarious. Now I watch it in the evenings and see something funny no matter how many times I watch them!! When I recently traveled, I took the dvd with me and watched on my player at night.  I just love the humor!

This show keeps me laughing. I can see myself in some of the episodes doing the same things. I wish this show had continued. Love Julia Louis-Dreyfus' performance. Received on time and new condition as ordered. Will order more as a prime member.
I have all her Seasons - I just love Old Christine.  Julia Louis-Dreyfus is hillarious!  I hate they cancelled the show, I really miss it.  Thanks.
Love this show.....makes me laugh!!  Julia Louis-Dreyfus is wonderful in the role of Christine and the rest of the cast is great too.

The New Adventures of Old Christine's Season 3 deserves 5-stars, but I gave it two because of so few episodes.
Two DVD's, 10 episodes. Regular price, 34.99, on sale 24.99.
What I'd like to know is the actual cost in the making of a DVD.

Season 3's episodes are well-written, well-acted and hilarious.

I love Julia-Louis Dreyfus. She's one of the funniest comedians of the 21st century. A newer version of Lucille Ball.
The remaining cast members are excellent actors, too.

Each character does a fantastic job, well-suited to their roles, in a family-type atmosphere.

I recommend buying Season 3 especially if you're a die-hard Julia/Elaine/Christine fan..
Prepare youself to watch the complete season at one sitting. Buy a smaller bag of popcorn. lol. Toni
Wish the show hadn't been cancelled. This show makes me laugh out loud several times during every single episode! Love it.
Too bad this is only 10 episodes long due to the writers strike. However this is (was) still a great show getting better and better.
Excellent series. I bought the entire five seasons because I loved this show. Who wouldn't want to hear and see Wanda Sykes and Julia Louise Dreyfuss as friends.
One of the funniest shows on television.  Julia Louis-Dreyfus is as good as, if not better, than she was on Seinfeld.

The ten episodes are very good, but because of the writer's strike during that year every show on tv was shortened in episodes.  I still enjoy the first two seasons of this show the most, but each season has some really funny scenes and episodes.
oh crap. i had the mistake of putting in 5 stars for the first two comments for seasons 3 and 4. well i love this DVD clear as crystal. but it has no subtitles. it arrived on time.

This is honestly one of the best situation comedy series of recent years.
Julia Louis Dreyfus is one of he all-time funniest female comic actors
in the history of the medium. She shines beyond Seinfeld here.

A couple of misguided customers gave this set a single star because
of technical problems they had with delivery/product and not the actual
programs. It really doesn't make sense to do that on Amazon. You are
supposed to rate the actual program being sold here and not complain if
your shipment was damaged, which has nothing to do with rating the show.

I never have written a review before but I was having trouble opening the window for customer feedback. Was disapointed that this DVD was purchased from Amazon and it is a bootleg copy. The originals were copied onto an inferior disk therefore it clicked the whole time it was played. Was suspicious when I first opened it that it was not the same packaging from Season 1 and Season 2 that I have. The disk was even a pinkish color not like the siver ones of regular DVD's. It did not say original in the discription when I went back and checked but I thought Amazon only sold original copies. Shame on you Amazon! Buyer beware. The only good thing about this is that Amazon does have a great return policy. The bad thing is, I have to reorder with someone else and wait for my new copy.

This was my third attempt at purchasing this season from amazon and all were defective.  Seasons one and two were great but season three must have some manufactures defect. Great show wish I could get third season

I saw the last half of this episode and I wanted to see the first part, I saw that amazon had it on their list of episodes to buy so I took a chance and bought it this was the first time I every bought an episode of any show on Amazon and everything worked out just fine and I am happy with this purchase!

This TV show is so very funny. It is a family show that you can all watch together. The prices on Amazon .com are always great and the DVD was new and as advertized in the package. The shipping is always very fast. Buy this DVD and you will enjoy the show anytime you want to put it in your DVD player.

the good: it's christine at her best - funny as hell, honest and with perfect comic timing
the bad: it's short - becouse of the writers stke we have only 10 episodes
the ugly: no suotitles and no extras
but even 10 episodes makes you wanna LOL. Love everything about this season! The last episode with Jason Alexander is one of the best!
Old Christine is one of my favorites comedies ever!
Thank you WB shop.com for releasing this show. Also thank you amazon for making it available. this is a great DVD no scratches love this show and LOVE Amazon!!

Yeah I said WTF! it doesn't have closed captioned. Tough to be deaf and not able to laugh to this fabulous show I watch live on tv. Now I want to own a DVD season....but no, it doesn't have cc or doesn't provid subtitle option. I even contact Warner Brothers, no change. Just sharing my opinion here.
Love this series-just started watching in reruns-decided to start from the beginning and glad I bought this series. Product was packed great recived in a timely manner.
Love this show.
Very Funny!!

We see Christine, once again, try SO hard, to make the " little engine that could", run out of steam, mid-wreck. She doesn't see it that way, as she knows that just around the corner, love & the rest are waiting for her. The cast of actors only enriche that feeling for her( this cast has always seemed to klick, from the first show). Intelligent & really funny sit-coms, are hard to find, ( lice episode will bring tears to your eyes from laughing,
or it did for me).!!!

Great quality packaging and DVD, brand new. This show is absolute comic gold. Julia Louis-Dreyfus is a seriously underrated actress. She is a genius and portrays an awkward, lovable, beautifully hilarious flawed divorced mother. The supporting cast is also amazing.
HILARIOUS!
VERY funny. Good television writing for sure. Totally recommend.
Great show. Hilarious!
If you like to laugh, by this whole collection!
I love the storyline of this series and disappointed it didn't go longer than 5 seasons.  Julie L-D is a great actress
Arrived on time and I just love this series.  Will buy the rest when I am able.
